name: spesbcdi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2)

comment: A lemma for introducing an existential quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
